title: ListUsers 1
content:
[[iftags +component]]
[[div style="background: rgba(201,133,184,.4); box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #999; padding: .5em;"]]
ListUsers module for non-Wikidot users.

+ How to use?
> ##red|[[include component:listusers-1 users="."]]##
> @@##red|@@**%%name%%**@@##@@
> ##red|[[include component:listusers-2]]##
> @@##blue|@@**guest**@@##@@
> ##red|[[include component:listusers-3]]##

----
* @@http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/component:listusers-1@@
* http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/component:listusers-2
* http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/component:listusers-3
[[/div]]
----
[[/iftags]]

[[div class="textchange"]]
[[module ListUsers users={$users}]]
[[div class="sitemember"]]
author: 7happy7
